author: steveh
msg: Calling out the counter-intuitive path for FORREST_HOME, which everyone seems gets wrong the when they install Forrest on their machine.

author: rich
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-408 : test distribution's test recorder config jar contains files that have hard coded paths rather than the desired tokens
This is a contribution from Julie Zhuo.

author: vgritsenko
msg: CForms: JavaSelectionList implementations can now be Contextualizable and
can build SelectionLists with XMLizable labels.

author: ekoneil
msg: Fix for JIRA 420.  This requires using SimpleTagSupport.findAncestorWithClass which handles a superset of JSP tag nesting cases than TagSupport.findAncestorWithClass.
Also adds a test for the case where a repeater is nested isnside of a data grid.
